channel.title: PromisedLand 317 | Flawless PvP | 100% Curses | Torva | VPSED
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/nb4pwg.jpg[/img]
[CENTER]Website: [url=http://Www.promisedlandv2.tk]Www.promisedlandv2.tk[/url][/CENTER]
-Bossing Features- Godwars Corp beast Kbd Dag kings Many More Come And See For Yourself!
-minigames- custom barrows. 63 wave fight caves. pest control. funpk. Duel Arena fully working.
list of what we can offer! - working curses. - corp beast. - easy/hard slayer tasks with different point values. - pk timer (like pvp worlds on rs) - variety of pk areas and skilling areas! - working spirit shields, d claws, chaotics. - 100% skills all trainable. (some are easier to train then others) - a great combat system. - custom shops pkp and normal - ::trade area to buy/sell items. - great combat exp rates - fast simple to train wont waste days getting maxed combat! - Boss monsters that drop great items! - 63 wave fight caves - 24/7 vpsed with no lagg at all! - Godwars dungeon now added with 100% drops and animations - Divine prayer drain effect and elysian Effect
Pictures: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/fjovt4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ipv4ad.png[/img]
Boss Teleports: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/30bh2s4.png[/img]
Minigame Teleports: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/bduw48.png[/img]
Owner is Jon and Prodin turm[/CENTER]

list of what we can offer!

  • working curses.
  • corp beast.
  • easy/hard slayer tasks with different point values.
  • pk timer (like pvp worlds on rs)
  • variety of pk areas and skilling areas!
  • working spirit shields, d claws, chaotics.
  • 100% skills all trainable. (some are easier to train then others)
  • a great combat system.
  • custom shops pkp and normal
  • ::trade area to buy/sell items.
  • great combat exp rates - fast simple to train wont waste days getting maxed combat!
  • Boss monsters that drop great items!
  • 63 wave fight caves
  • 24/7 vpsed with no lagg at all!
  • Godwars dungeon now added with 100% drops and animations
  • Divine prayer drain effect and elysian Effect
